label: bike
caption: The rider's bike, a dusty enduro motorcycle, weaves through a rugged trail carved out of dense forest foliage, its knobby tires kicking up small rocks and dirt clouds as it navigates a steep incline. The rider, clad in protective gear, appears to be airborne, their weight shifted forward over the handlebars as they take on a challenging section of terrain. A few trees ahead, the trail opens up onto a flat clearing, where a faint ribbon of dust suggests that other riders have passed through recently.
